price: 37. Als dan de hemel splijt, en het wordt rood zoals rode olie of rode huid.
arabic: فَإِذَا ٱنشَقَّتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَكَانَتۡ وَرۡدَةٗ كَٱلدِّهَانِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā inshaqqati al-samāu fakānat wardatan kal-dihāni
